entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 02:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SSW 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
